summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2787, for the improvement of West Willow Street from California Avenue to Fauntleroy Boulevard, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, paving constructing concrete walks, water mains and sewers, under Ordinance No. 33326and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
